uk.ac.ncl.tongzhou.advancedjava.model

Class DrivingLicence

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ncl.tongzhou.advancedjava.model.DrivingLicence

  • public class DrivingLicence
extends java.lang.Object
    DrivingLicence A driving licence has a unique number, a date of issue, and an indication whether the licence is a full driving licence or not.
